title: Devil's curry
ingredients: ['8 cloves garlic', 'Knob of galangal root or root ginger, peeled and sliced', '5 small onions, roughly chopped', '2 fresh red chillies, chopped', '2 sticks lemon grass (1 layer of skin peeled)', 'Knob of fresh turmeric, peeled or 1 heaped teaspoon of dried turmeric', '1 teaspoon of freshly ground black pepper', '10 candlenuts or macadamia nuts', '3 tablespoons belacan (prawn paste)', '120ml (4 fl oz) water', '3 tablespoons of vegetable oil', '1 or 2 tablespoons chilli paste', '1 or 2 tablespoons English mustard', '5 cloves', '5 cardamom seeds', '1 cinnamon stick', '400ml (14 fl oz) water', '1 (500g) bag of baby potatoes, washed and halved', '6 chicken breast fillets or 12 boneless chicken thighs', 'Bunch of fresh coriander leaves, chopped', 'Salt to taste']
